dict.acceptation: 耸肩（以表示冷淡，怀疑等）；
耸肩；女式短茄克衫或前开襟毛线衫；

sent.orig: Shrug your shoulders! Teddy Bear. Shrug!
sent.trans: 把你的肩膀耸一耸！玩具熊。耸一耸！

sent.orig: Shrug your shoulders! Teddy Bear. Shrug your shoulders! Teddy Bear.
sent.trans: 耸一耸你的肩膀！玩具熊。耸一耸你的肩膀！玩具熊。

sent.orig: DESIGNER Black Velvet Shrug Wrap You are bidding on a DESIGNER Black Velvet Shrug Wrap.
sent.trans: 设计师黑色天鹅绒耸耸肩裹你是一个设计师竞投裹黑色天鹅绒耸耸肩。

sent.orig: He gave a shrug of the shoulders.
He celebrated with a shrug and a jog in front of the now silent Levski fans.
sent.trans: 对此球的庆祝，他只是耸一耸肩，然后在沉静的列夫斯基球迷面前一路慢跑回本队半场。
